races.title: Races
races.subtitle: Race list
races.noData: No data available for this race

info.title: üöß Important information:
info.limit: I can currently only retrieve statistics for the top {limit} per race. Therefore, you may not be marked on some races if you finished beyond this position.
info.apology: I apologize for this inconvenience. SubRace is an independent project that requires a lot of time and costs.
info.support: If you would like to support the project, you can follow <link>this LINK</link>.

leaderboard.incompleteDataDescription: Only the podium is available for this race. Complete data is only counted from day 60 onwards.

description.title: What is SubRace?
description.text1: SubRace is an Instagram project of marble races between my followers.
description.text2: Every day, I collect and process race data to keep this platform up to date and accessible to everyone.

costs.title: An independent project that costs money
costs.text1: SubRace is a 100% independent project developed and maintained by a single person. This project represents a significant investment in time and money:
costs.text2: Every month, I spend money on hosting, servers, development tools and platform maintenance. Without support, it becomes difficult to continue improving and maintaining this free service for the community.

donation.title: Support the project
donation.description: Your contribution, even modest, helps me cover costs and continue developing SubRace for you.

cta.title: Help SubRace continue
cta.description: Every donation counts and allows us to continue offering this free service to the entire community. Thank you for your support!
